scripts.prepare: yarn run lerna:link && npx lerna run prepare --parallel
scripts.lint:all: yarn lint && yarn lint:markdown && yarn lint:spellcheck && yarn tsc:compile
scripts.bootstrap: (rnv unlink|| true) && npx lerna bootstrap && npx jetify && yarn build
scripts.bootstrap-link: (rnv unlink || true) && npx lerna bootstrap && (rnv link || true)
scripts.bootstrap-clean: rm -rf ./node_modules; npx lerna clean --yes && yarn bootstrap
scripts.decrypt-harness: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv crypto decrypt --ci
scripts.decrypt-template: cd packages/template && npx rnv crypto decrypt -c template --ci
scripts.deploy-harness-macos: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv export -p macos -s production --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:macos-prod
scripts.deploy-harness-macos-canary: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv export -p macos -s canary --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:macos-canary

scripts.deploy-template-macos-canary: cd packages/template && npx rnv export -p macos -s canary -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:macos-canary
scripts.deploy-template-ios: cd packages/template && npx rnv export -p ios -s production -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:ios-prod
scripts.deploy-template-ios-canary: cd packages/template && npx rnv export -p ios -s canary -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:ios-canary
scripts.deploy-template-android: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p android -s production -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:android-prod
scripts.deploy-template-android-canary: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p android -s canary -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:android-canary

scripts.deploy-template-androidtv-canary: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p androidtv -s canary -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:androidtv-canary
scripts.deploy-template-firetv: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p firetv -s production -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:firetv-prod
scripts.deploy-template-firetv-canary: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p firetv -s canary -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn deploy:firetv-canary

scripts.e2e-harness-tvos: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv build -p tvos -s test --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:tvos
scripts.e2e-harness-androidtv: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv build -p androidtv -s test --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:androidtv
scripts.e2e-harness-macos: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv build -p macos -s test --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:macos
scripts.e2e-harness-web: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv start -p web -s test --packageManager yarn --ci & sleep 60 && cd packages/app-harness && yarn e2e:web && kill $(lsof -t -i:8080)
scripts.e2e-template-ios: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p ios -s test -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:ios
scripts.e2e-template-android: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p android -s test -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:android
scripts.e2e-template-tvos: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p tvos -s test -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:tvos
scripts.e2e-template-androidtv: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p androidtv -s test -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:androidtv
scripts.e2e-template-macos: cd packages/template && npx rnv build -p macos -s test -c template --packageManager yarn --ci && yarn e2e:macos
scripts.e2e-template-web: cd packages/template && npx rnv start -p web -s test -c template --packageManager yarn --ci & sleep 60 && cd packages/template && yarn e2e:web && kill $(lsof -t -i:8080)
scripts.docs-deploy-preview: cd docs && yarn && yarn build && yarn deploy-preview
scripts.docs-deploy-prod: cd docs && yarn && yarn build && yarn deploy-prod
scripts.prepare-harness-nightly: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv hooks run -x prepareNightlyBuild --only
scripts.prepare-template-nightly: cd packages/template && npx rnv hooks run -x prepareNightlyBuild -c template --only
scripts.clean-harness-post-nightly: cd packages/app-harness && npx rnv hooks run -x cleanupPostNightly --only
scripts.clean-template-post-nightly: cd packages/template && npx rnv hooks run -x cleanupPostNightly -c template --only
scripts.release: lerna version --force-publish --no-git-tag-version --no-push && yarn update-versions && yarn gitCommit && lerna publish from-package && yarn gitTag
scripts.release-alpha: lerna version --force-publish --no-git-tag-version --no-push && yarn update-versions && yarn gitCommit && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag alpha --yes && yarn gitTag
scripts.release-feat: lerna version --force-publish --no-git-tag-version --no-push && yarn update-versions && yarn gitCommit && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag feat --yes && yarn gitTag
scripts.release-dry: lerna version --force-publish --no-git-tag-version --no-push && npx rnv hooks run -x updateVersions
scripts.deploy-packages: npm run deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --yes && git push origin HEAD

hooks.pre-commit: yarn build && yarn lint && yarn test
